summary: We have long-standing concerns about the Food and Drug Administration's ability to oversee the increasingly global pharmaceutical supply chain, an issue on our High Risk List since 2009. This testimony discusses some of those concerns and FDA's inspection activities during the COVID-19 pandemic. title: Drug Safety: FDA's Future Inspection Plans Need to Address Issues Presented by COVID-19 Backlog
